ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
//重定向和导入书架处理
let i = String(book.bookUrl).includes('https:/');
if (i) {
	book.bookUrl = `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(baseUrl.replace(/,{o.+/,''))},{'type':''}`;
	}

//告诉目录是由详情来的
java.put('sx1',1);

nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');
if (nn=='') {
	{{source.loginUrl}}
	nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');}

//发书评功能
let bkbl = book.getVariable("custom");
//解书籍地址
let ml = String(book.bookUrl).replace(/.+,(.+),.+/,'$1');
let mlj = java.base64Decode(ml);
let [, bkid=''] = mlj.match(/book\/(\d+)/)||[];
//↑获取书id
java.put('bkid',bkid);

if (bkbl=='🔒'||bkbl=='') {
//带🔒或书籍变量为空会经过这里
//处理加书架功能
let sj=java.get('sj');
let sj2=source.get('8xsj'); //启用同步的标识
if (sj=='2'&&sj2=='1') {java.put('sj',3);tbshujia(nn,bkid);}
else if (sj=='1') {java.put('sj',2);}

	}
else if (bkbl=='目录') {
	//清空最新章储存强制刷新目录
	java.put('8xzx','');
	//清空输入的书籍变量
	book.putCustomVariable('');}
else {
let pfurl = nn+'/modules/article/rating.php';
let plurl = nn+'/modules/article/reviews.php';
let ck = source.getLoginHeader()||'';
let cki = ck.match(/UserToken%3D([^%]+)/)||['',''];
tk = cki[1];
//↑获取链接和tk

if (bkid != '' && tk != '') {
let tm = new Date().getTime();
let bkfs = (bkbl.match(/^(\d|10)分$/) || ['','0'])[1];
let pfbody = `score=${bkfs}&id=${bkid}&ajax_request=${tm}`;
let plbody = `ptitle=&act=newpost&jieqi_token=${tk}&Submit=&pcontent=${bkbl}&aid=${bkid}&ajax_request=${tm}`;

let headers = JSON.parse(eval(source.header.replace('@js:','')+''));
headers['Referer']=mlj;

if (bkfs != 0) {url=pfurl;body=pfbody;}
else {url=plurl;body=plbody;}
//清空输入的书籍变量
book.putCustomVariable('');
//let by = java.post(url,body,headers).body();
let by = java.connect(url+','+JSON.stringify(
    	{"method": "POST",
    	header:headers,
    	body:body})
    	).body();
java.longToast("\n"+java.htmlFormat(by));
//随机延时0-1秒
let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*1001);
Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(tim);
cache.deleteMemory('bax'+bkid);
	} else if (tk == '') {java.toast('未登录');}
}

if (!i) {
	 //i时直接用重定向访问结果
result=cache.getFromMemory('bax'+bkid);}

//先发评论再访问刷新
if (!result) {
	let tt = java.hexDecodeToString(src);
	//不能直接访问tt，result无法改动
	tt=String(tt).replace(/https\:\/{2}[A-z\d\.]+/,'');
	const startTime=new Date().getTime();
	result = java.ajax(nn+tt)+'';
	const endTime=new Date().getTime();
	let speed = (endTime - startTime)/1000;
	if (speed>39) {java.toast('\n详情页访问延迟过长：'+speed.toFixed()+'秒');}
	result&&cache.putMemory('bax'+bkid,result);
	}
	java.setContent(result+[]);

//内容判断
let r = java.getString('@@meta[name="keywords"]@content');
let name=String(r).replace(/\, .+/,'');
let author=String(r).replace(/.+\, /,'');

if (name) {
	book.name=String(book.name)||name;
	book.author=String(book.author)||author;
//放入书名
let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap()||{};
Info['书名'] = book.name;
source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
//放入ID和书名。正式版该语法会报错
cache.putMemory('8xid',{[bkid]: book.name});
	if (book.name!=name) {
			let sm=source.get('8xsm'),sm1=java.get('sm1');
			//sm功能标记，sm1判断标记
			if (sm1=='') {
			//可能源地址换新了，进行更新
			cache.put('8xbl1', source.getVariable() );
			source.setVariable('');
			java.put('sm1',1);
			} else if (sm=='1') {
				book.name=name;
				java.toast("已自动更新书名");
			} else if (sm1=='1') {
				java.longToast("详情页获取的书名：\n《"+name+"》");
				java.log("书名："+name);
				java.put('sm1',2);
			}
			
}	else if (book.author!=author) {
	// book.author=author;
java.log("获取的作者不同，作者："+author);} //仅输出日志
	
	//书名和作者正常由此过
	}
else {
	//书名加载失败
	cache.put('8xbl1', source.getVariable() );
	source.setVariable('');
	java.toast("详情页加载失败，请刷新重试");
}
	result

ruleContent.content:
<js>
let bin = book.durChapterIndex;
let cin = chapter.index;
let inn = cin - bin;
let dn = source.get('8xdn');
let sleep = Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep;
//java.log(chapter.title+'inn：'+inn);
if ((inn==-4||inn==4)&&dn!=1) {java.longToast('\n使用下载需要在书源登录界面开启功能\n建议预下载设定不要大于3');}

nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');
if (nn=='') {
	{{source.loginUrl}}
	nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');}

let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*401);
let ii = 1;
//手动限制并发,下载时(0-40秒随机)

switch(inn) {
	case 0: break;
	case 1: sleep(1500+tim); break;
	case 2: sleep(4500+tim); break;
	case 3: sleep(7500+tim); break;
	case -1: sleep(3000+tim); break;
	case -2: dn==1 ? sleep(6000+tim) : ii=0;break;
	case -3: dn==1 ? sleep(9000+tim) : ii=0;break;
	default: dn==1 ? sleep(tim*100) : ii=0;break;
}

//延时结束
let bkid = java.get('bkid'); //两个putm用

if (inn==0||inn==1) {
//放入书名和id
cache.putMemory('8xid',{[bkid]: book.name});
let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap()||{};
Info['书名'] = book.name;
source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
// 本地阅读进度
let sjj=source.get('sj'+bkid)+'';
if (java.get('sj')==3||sjj) {	source.put('sj'+bkid,book.author+','+book.durChapterTitle+','+book.durChapterIndex);}
}


let tt = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
tt=String(tt).replace(/https\:\/{2}[A-z\d\.]+/,nn);
//java.log('正文地址：'+tt);
let ml = String(book.tocUrl).replace(/.+,(.+),.+/,'$1');
let mlj = java.base64Decode(ml);

if (ii) {
//↓第一次访问正文
try {
const startTime=new Date().getTime();
result=java.ajax(tt);
const endTime=new Date().getTime();
let speed = (endTime - startTime)/1000;
if (speed>39) java.toast('\n正文页访问延迟过长：'+speed.toFixed()+'秒');
//复原手机版链接，干掉字数统计

variableComment:
♦源变量：
　 当前书源使用的网址
　 可点击发现页版本号手动刷新

♦书籍变量：
　 ①填写  🔒 并刷新，关闭本书评论显示
　 ②填写“目录”并刷新，强制刷新目录
　 ③填写分数并刷新，使用分数进行评分
　 ④填写其它并刷新，内容作为评论发送
分数格式示意“1分”“2分”…“10分”

㊟默认详情页检测到有更新内容时才会刷新目录

！注意区分源变量和书籍变量

bookSourceComment:
每隔八小时访问一遍签到（使用的时候访问）
点击“登录”自定义发现
更改过发现要刷新本书源才会生效

❗️注意事项:
1、请不要退出晋江app的账号，只要点了退出，或者在其他地方登录了，都要重新抓token。
2、更新token，书籍就要更新目录。
3、【抓包token登录】和【账号登录】二选一，【抓包token登录】的优先级高些，填了【抓包token登录】，就是按【抓包token登录的值】登录

4、登录步骤【设备保护关闭的状态下】：
①填写好账号密码，点击“邮箱验证码”或者“手机验证码”
②填写好验证码，点击“邮箱登录”或者“手机登录”
③想要确认是否成功可以在登录UI里点右上角三点，查看登录头token里是否有值。
④如果弹出提示“请校检验证码”，可尝试填入上一次发送给你验证码。

5、如果邮箱和手机号无法登录，可能是需要过滑动验证码，可尝试先在晋江app里登录一遍后，再在阅读里登录，❗️还是不行就只能抓包token，填写在“抓包token登录”处。

function parseCategory(data) {
  const [title, url, num = defaultNumPerRow] = data.split(separator);
  
  const fullUrl = /^\d+|natural/.test(url) 
    ? `http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%22${url}%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22{{(page-1)*25}}%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=148`
    : url;
  
  return [title, fullUrl, num];
}

// 解析标签数据
function parseTag(data, tagCategory) {
  const [title, url, num = defaultNumPerRow, tagType] = data.split(separator);
  
  let fullUrl = url;
  if (tagType === "bq") {
    fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=${url}&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=${tagCategory}&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token=${token}`;
  } else if (tagType === "at") {
  	fullUrl = `https://app-cdn.jjwxc.com/androidapi/authorColumn?authorid=${url}`;
  	
  	}else if (tagType === "class") {
  	fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/incrementFavorite,{'method':'POST','body':\"versionCode=313&token=${token}&order=1&classId=${url}&backupTime=${Date.now()}\"}`
  	
  	}else if (tagType === "lx") {
    fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=${tagCategory}&sd=0&lx=${url}&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token=${token}`;
  }
  return [title, fullUrl, num];
}

// 创建 FlexBox 对象
function createFlexBox(title, url, num) {
  const flexBasisMap = { 1: 1, 2: 0.4, 3: 0.25, 4: 0.2, 5: 0.15, 7: 0.1, 10: 0.05 };
  return {
    title,
    url: url || '',
    style: {
      layout_flexGrow: 1,
      layout_flexBasisPercent: flexBasisMap[num]
    }
  };
}

//获取书架数据
function getShelf(){
    let sourceGet = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\n*(?:请勿删除此书架数据)*❗️[\s\S]+?❗️/g,'');
	let token = Map("token");
	let ShelfUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/incrementFavorite,{'method':'POST','body':\"versionCode=313&token=${token}&order=1&classId=&backupTime=${Date.now()}\"}`
	let ShelfJson = String(java.ajax(ShelfUrl));
    ShelfJson = JSON.parse(ShelfJson);
	    function extractClassInfo(obj, result = [], uniqueSet = new Set()) {
	    // 如果当前对象是数组，递归遍历数组中的每个元素
	    if (Array.isArray(obj)) {
	        for (let item of obj) {
	            extractClassInfo(item, result, uniqueSet);
	        }
	    } else if (typeof obj === 'object' && obj !== null) {
        // 检查是否存在 className 和 classId
	        if (obj.hasOwnProperty('className') && obj.hasOwnProperty('classId')) {
	            let className = obj.className;
	            // 如果 className 为空，设置为“尚未分类”
	            if (className.trim() === "") {
	                className = "尚未分类";
	            }
	            // 构造组合字符串
	            const combo = `${className}::${obj.classId}`;
	            // 如果组合字符串未出现过，添加到结果中
	            if (!uniqueSet.has(combo)) {
	                uniqueSet.add(combo);
	                result.push(combo);
	            }
	        }
	        // 递归遍历对象的每个属性
	        for (let key in obj) {
	            extractClassInfo(obj[key], result, uniqueSet);
	        }
  		  }
    		return result;
	   }

	let ShlefClass = "请勿删除此书架数据❗️"+JSON.stringify(extractClassInfo(ShelfJson))+"❗️"
	source.setVariable(sourceGet+"\n"+ShlefClass);
	java.longToast("已获取书架数据，请点击选择显示的书架")
}

function showShelf(){
	try{
		if(!/❗️([\s\S]+?)❗️/.test(String(source.getVariable()))){

		}
		let sourceGet = String(source.getVariable()).match(/❗️([\s\S]+?)❗️/)[1];
		let classNameList = JSON.parse(sourceGet);
		let className = classNameList.map((x,i)=>i+"、"+x.split("::")[0]);
		 
		// 初始 x 值
		let x = 50;
		// x 的增量
		const xIncrement = 230; // 250 - 20 = 230
		// x 的最大值
		const xMax = 910;
		// 生成 <tspan> 元素的字符串
		let tspanElements = className.map((item) => {
		    // 如果 x 为 20，dy 为 "1.5em"，否则为 "0"
		    const dy = x === 50 ? "1.5em" : "0";
		    // 构造 <tspan> 元素
		    const tspan = `<tspan x="${x}" dy="${dy}">${item}</tspan>`;
		    // 更新 x 的值
		    x += xIncrement;
		    // 如果 x 超过最大值，重置为 20
		    if (x > xMax) {
		        x = 50;
		    }
		    return tspan;
		}).join("\n"); // 用换行符拼接

		 svg = `<svg width="1190" height="300" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

	}

function decode() { baseUrl = `https://app.jjwxc.org/androidapi/chapterContent?versionCode=381&${bDe(baseUrl)}`; //let date = "Mobile " + Date.now(); let response = java.get(baseUrl, {}); let content = String(response.body()); isPay = !/"content"/.test(content); if(isPay){ let accesskey = String(response.header("accesskey")); let keyString = String(response.header("keystring")); let accesskeyLen = accesskey.length; let v6 = accesskey.charCodeAt(accesskeyLen - 1); let v9 = 0; for (var i = 0; i < accesskey.length; i++) { v9 += accesskey.charCodeAt(i); } let v15 = v9 % keyString.length; let v17 = Math.floor(v9 / 65); let v18 = keyString.length; let v43 = keyString.substring(v15, v17 + v15 > v18 ? v18 : v17 + v15); let v32 = content.length; let [v38, dest] = (v6 & 1) !== 0 ? [content.slice(-12), content.slice(0, -12)] : [content.slice(0, 12), content.slice(12)]; let key = java.md5Encode(v43 + v38).slice(0, 8); let iv = java.md5Encode(v38).slice(0, 8); content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", key, iv).decryptStr(dest); } return content } if (/jjwxc|vipContent/.test(baseUrl)) { let intro = String(java.get("intro1")).replace(/\s/g, ''); const hasContent = /"content"/.test(result); java.setContent(hasContent ? result : decode()); intro = intro ? `◎${intro}◎
` : ''; let content = String(java.getString("$..content")); let saybody = java.getString("$..sayBody"); let say = /[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/.test(saybody) ? `\n【📢作者有话说】\n${saybody}` : ''; if (/token|vipContent/.test(baseUrl)) { const vipc = content.length > 30 ? java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", "KW8Dvm2N", "1ae2c94b").decryptStr(content) : `${java.getString("$..message")}\n登录后请更新目录，刷新正文`; result = intro + vipc + say; } else { result = intro + content + say; } } else { result = ""; } // 评论处理 const bbb = book.getVariable("custom"); const sss = source.getVariable(); if (/评论/.test(bbb) || /评论/.test(sss)) { const commentNum = (/评论(\d+)/.exec(bbb) || /评论(\d+)/.exec(sss))[1]; const commentUrl = baseUrl.replace(/androidapi/, 'comment').replace(/chapterContent/, 'getCommentList') + `&limit=${commentNum}&offset=0`; const comment = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)); const cflag = comment.code === "200" || comment.code === undefined; let commentb = ''; if (cflag) { const commentList = comment.commentList || comment.data?.commentList || []; commentb = commentList.map(b => `@${b.commentAuthor} 🕘${b.commentDate}\n${b.commentBody}\n‎\n`).join(''); } else { commentb = comment.message; } result += `\nㅤ\n最新评论：\n${commentb.replace(/<br>/g, '\n')}`; } result; ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+|◎\s+?◎|◎undefined◎

<js>
//去除章节简介与正文重复
if(/^◎/.test(result) ){
chapter = result.match(/◎([\s\S]+?)(…)*◎/)[1].replace(/\s/g,'').replace(/,/g,'，');

chapter2=result.match(/◎[\s\S]+?◎([\s\S]+)/)[1].replace(/\s/g,'').replace(/,/g,'，');

//前4个字相同就删除
num = 4
if(chapter.substring(0,num)==chapter2.substring(0,num)){
	result = result.replace(/◎[\s\S]+?◎/,'')
	}else{result}
}else{result}


/*
——◎。！？，；：、.?!,;:》 】）”’…~"')
如果不是以这些标点符号结尾，里面有一个字符跟章节名相同了就会被删除
*/
	function removeDuplicatedParagraphs(text, chapterTitle) {
    var paragraphs = text.split('\n');
    
    // 检查第一段是否包含特定字符 ◎
    var firstParagraph = paragraphs[0].trim();
    var containsSpecialChar = firstParagraph.includes('◎');
    
    // 根据是否包含特殊字符决定处理哪一段
    var targetIndex = containsSpecialChar ? 1 : 0;
    var targetParagraph = paragraphs[targetIndex].trim();
    
    // 检查目标段落结尾是否有标点符号
    var lastChar = targetParagraph.charAt(targetParagraph.length - 1);
    var isPunctuation = /[——◎。！？，；：、\.\?!,;:》 】）”’…~"'\)]/.test(lastChar);
    
    if (!isPunctuation) {
        // 只要有一个字与章节名相同就删除
        for (var char of chapterTitle) {
            if (targetParagraph.includes(char)) {
                if (char === ' ' || char === '☪') continue;
                java.log("删除当前段落："+targetParagraph)
                java.log("当前章节名："+chapterTitle)
                java.log("相同文字："+char)
                paragraphs.splice(targetIndex, 1);
                break;
            }
        }
    }

    return paragraphs.join('\n');
}
const bbb = book.getVariable("custom");

if(/净化/.test(sss)||/净化/.test(bbb))result = removeDuplicatedParagraphs(result, title);

result.replace(/<br\/>/g,'\n')

variableComment:
1、书籍变量（当前书）
填写 [去章节序号] —— 去除章节序号
填写[章节名]  ——  变为第xx章 章节名

填写 [目录简介【符号】] —— 章节简介放到目录列表，正文不出现 符号：跟章节名连接时中间的符号，如 目录简介【 】，中间将为空格

填写 [评论+评论数量]——如 评论50  则可以显示50条评论，数量必填

填写 [开启购买/关闭购买]  —— 如 开启购买 则会开启自动购买下五章【确认以后点右上角三点刷新才会生效，使用完毕后最好删除，避免重复请求】

填写[净化] —— 这个是用来删除正文第一段是章节名的，可能会误伤。

2、源变量（所有书）
同书籍变量

const groupDatas = [];
let infoData = [];
function deviceType() {
  try {
    return!!java.androidId();
  } catch (e) {
    return false;
  }
}
let device = deviceType()? 'android' : 'ios';
if (device == 'android' && (String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')))) {
    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com'))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);
        const data = JSON.parse(res).data;

        data.forEach(group => {
            let key;
            for (key in group) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,
                    "url": base_url +"/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + group[key].join(","),
                    "style": {
                        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
            groupDatas.push({
                "title": "--",
                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                }
            });
        }
    }

    try {
    	java.longToast("请稍等,正在更新分组数据!");
    // 用户信息
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

    infoData = [
        {
            "title": `${userInfo}个人中心`,
            "url": "",
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        }
    ];
    groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
    java.longToast("网络错误或登录失效或阅读版本过低，请重新登录番茄重试！");
    }

}

  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {
